DESCRIPTION: Playing enough Cards with the same Type will finish the Chain and unlock the specified Effect. Chains wear off at the end of turn.
Damage taken after Block is reduced. NL Half of the Reduced damage is dealt at the end of the turn after next turn.
Cards that count as any card type for finishing a Chain.
Damage that was relayed. Half of it (rounded down) is dealt to the Player at the end of the next turn.
When you obtain 3 Momentum, add a Swirl into your hand.
Doubles the damage and Block of Swirls this turn.
Creatures lose HP everytime they gain Block.
